name: Magical Princess
description:
Magical Princess is a card-based RPG game. Each card has different skills and attributes. Players need to collect more cards to expand their team.

The basic operation of the game
Arrange the position of the card by dragging with the mouse. The perfect combination of formation and different cards can exert the greatest power.


Card type
Strong attack type: powerful melee attack ability. Agile: Attack speed is fast, and there is a high crit rate and dodge rate.
Defensive: It has high vitality and high defense.
Magic: With powerful ranged attack power and a wide range of magic skills.
Auxiliary: It can restore life, and it can also add the attributes of the card.


Equipment and development system
Level: Each card can gain experience value through battle. The experience value can be upgraded to a certain extent. After the level is increased, the card's attributes will also be improved.
Quality: Each card can be upgraded in quality, the quality will be improved and the hidden attributes will be obtained.
Equipment: Each card can be equipped with different weapons and armor, which can greatly improve the attributes, and weapons and armor can also be enhanced to improve the quality.
